Achievement.Description: SAS: Base, Macros, RDBMS, SAS

Connect, SQL, Arrays, (Multivariate/Logistic) Regression Analysis, ANOVA, Hypothesis Testing, Multicollinearity, Correlation Analysis, Time Series forcasting, R, Segmentation, Structural Equation Modeling(SEM)
Other: MS Excel, Basic DB2, DB2 SQL, My SQL, Cobol, JCL, VSAM, Fileaid, Filemanager
Endvr, CA7, SCAM, FROG
Star Performer of the Quarter awards for consistent performance
Researched and Implemented Statistical error control methodology for various kind of hypothesis testing
Designed and implemented time series Data smoothing algorithm
For Symphony Teleca
As part of advanced analytics team use market research data to gain Insights and perform statistical analysis for drug/pharma companies to see the
Campaign Analysis, Brand Impact, Sales Impact, Compliance Impact, Promotional Effectiveness, Quality measures to help them make their marketing
Competitive Analysis, Data Insight, Physician Scoring, Trend Analysis, survey response
modeling, significance testing, market driver analysis, causal studies, adstock modeling, Media effectiveness studies
For IBM India Pvt Ltd
LFG(Lincoln Financial Group)
Creating Insurance Inventories as per client requirement, which includes data
validation, error check, data fixing and data manipulation
Regression analysis of Insurance Inventories
Generating, Debug & Reviewing SAS code, macros to create Summary, graph and
listing reports and data exploration
Involved in Feasibility, Impact Analysis, Estimation, Coding, Unit testing, SIT, Detailed
Design, Deployment, maintenance & also involved in peer reviews
The fetching & analyzing/transforming of insurance data through
Involved in testing of new funds for the company, create pricing files containing
synthetic unit values, do Trade import for the Assets sold and bought
Periodic(monthly/yearly) Fund performance calculation for the invested funds
